sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Procter & Gamble ( PG ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 15.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is UnitedHealth Group ( UNH ), trading down 4.5%.
UnitedHealth Group is showing a gain of 10.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading down 1.6%, and Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading up 1.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
